short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Kuromi’s fun energy to your browser with shortcuts, notes, and theme customization!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for Kuromi fans, this theme transforms your browsing experience with a lively and vibrant touch while offering a range of powerful features to enhance functionality. With every new tab, you'll be greeted by Kuromi's unique world, blending style and efficiency perfectly.

Shortcuts: Access your favorite apps and websites instantly. The Kuromi Theme offers customizable shortcuts on your new tab, allowing you to reach your preferred platforms without wasting time.

Time Display: Stay organized with a built-in clock and date display right on your new tab. The sleek and minimalist design seamlessly integrates with the Kuromi aesthetic, keeping you on schedule while adding charm to your browsing.

Bookmarks: Manage and access your favorite sites effortlessly! With the Kuromi Theme, bookmarks are just a click away, making your browsing experience smoother and more efficient.

Notes: Quickly jot down ideas or important information as you browse. The built-in notes feature lets you keep track of details without needing a separate app, ensuring you never miss a thought.

Theme Switching: Express yourself by switching between various Kuromi-themed backgrounds and colors. Personalize your browser to match your mood and style, making every browsing session uniquely yours.

Kuromi Theme is perfect for those who love Kuromi’s energetic charm and want a functional, stylish browsing experience. Download it now and step into Kuromi’s enchanting world every time you open your browser!
